Levon Aronian vs Yu Yangyi
GCT St. Louis Rapid & Blitz (2019) (blitz), St Louis, MO USA, rd 5, Aug-13 
Slav Defense: Quiet Variation (D11)

1. c4 c6 2. Nf3 d5 3. e3 Nf6 4. d4 g6 5. b4 Bg7 6. Bb2 O-O 7. Nbd2 a5 8. b5 a4 9. Rc1 Bf5 10. Be2 dc4 11. Bc4 cb5 12. Bb5 Qb6 13. Qe2 Ra5 14. Rc5 Nbd7 15. Nc4 Qd8 16. Rf5 gf5 17. Bd7 Nd7 18. Na5 Qa5 19. Qd2 Qb5 20. Qe2 Qb4 21. Qd2 Qc4 22. Qc3 Qa2 23. O-O Nb6 24. Ra1 Qc4 25. Qa5 Qb3 26. Qf5 e6 27. Qb1 Nc4 28. Bc1 Qb1 29. Rb1 Ra8 30. Rb7 a3 31. Rb1 a2 32. Ra1 e5 33. Kf1 ed4 34. ed4 Nb6 35. Ke2 Nd5 36. Bd2 Ra3 37. Kd1 Ra4 38. Kc2 Bd4 39. Nd4 Rd4 40. Ra2 Rc4 41. Kd3 Rg4 42. Ra5 Nf4 43. Bf4 Rf4 44. f3 Rb4 45. Rg5 Kf8 46. Ke3 h6 47. Rg4 Rb2 48. Kf4 Rb5 49. Kg3 Ra5 50. Kh4 Rb5 51. Re4 Kg7 52. g3 Rb2 53. Kh3 Rf2 54. Rg4 Kh7 55. Rf4 Kg6 56. g4 Ra2 57. Kg3 Ra1 58. h4 Rg1 59. Kf2 Ra1 60. h5 Kg7 61. Rf5 Ra2 62. Kg3 Ra3 63. Re5 Rb3 64. Kf4 Ra3 65. Re3 Ra4 66. Kf5 Ra5 67. Re5 Ra3 68. f4 Rf3 69. Re2 Rf1 70. Rg2 Rf3 71. g5 hg5 72. Kg5 Rf1 73. h6 Kh7 74. f5 Ra1 75. Kf6 Ra6 76. Kf7 Ra7 77. Kf6 Ra6 78. Kg5 Rh6 79. Re2 Ra6 80. Re7 Kg8 81. f6 Ra1

The Saint Louis Rapid and Blitz is the 4th stage of the 2019 Grand Chess Tour. The 10-player tournament takes place in the St. Louis Chess Club from 10-14 August. The prize fund is $150,000, with $37,500 for 1st place. 7 tour regulars, including World Champion Magnus Carlsen, are joined by wildcards Leinier Dominguez, Yu Yangyi and Richard Rapport.

The rapid section on the first 3 days is a single round-robin with a time control of 25 minutes for all moves and a 10-second delay from move 1. The final 2 days are a blitz double round-robin, with 18 rounds of 5+3 blitz. Rapid games count double, with 2 points for a win and 1 for a draw. A 2-player tie for first will be decided by a 2-game rapid mini-match (10+5) and, if necessary, an Armageddon game (5 vs. 4). Official website: grandchesstour.org

To those of you who read the description: You are an excellent subscriber! :)
